articles.description: The tennis world watched on as German Alexander Zverev created history at the Tokyo Olympics. Find out more here.
articles.content:
Alexander Zverev (pictured right) was emotional after winning Olympics gold in Tokyo. (Images: @MarkpalmerST/Getty Images)
Alexander Zverev has created tennis history at the Olympics and won the big… [+2671 chars]
